text: Shakespeare in Love is a 1998 British-American romantic comedy-drama movie starring Gwyneth Paltrow, Ben Affleck and Judi Dench. It won 7 Academy Awards, including Best Picture of 1998. This movie is about the involvement of William Shakespeare in a serious love affair with Viola (played by Paltrow). == Other websites == * Category:1998 comedy-drama movies Category:1998 romantic comedy movies Category:1998 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by John Madden Category:Movies set in the 16th century Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Shakespeare in Love
